rules: Rule1: If lab1 develops a cure for disease1, then substance1 cures disease1.
Rule2: Either lab1 develops a cure for disease1 or lab1 researches disease1.
Rule3: Provided that lab1 submits a manuscript on disease1, lab1 receives reviews on disease1.
Rule4: Under the condition that lab1 receives reviews on disease1, lab1 revises the manuscript on disease1.
Rule5: Whenever lab1 revises the manuscript on disease1, lab1 obtains a patent for disease1.
Rule6: Under the condition that lab1 researches disease1, lab1 synthesizes substance1.
Rule7: If substance1 treats disease1, then substance1 cures disease1.
Rule8: Either lab1 publishes findings on disease1 or, if lab1 has equipment for substance1, then the synthesis of substance1 by lab1 results in substance1 treating disease1.
Rule9: If lab1 obtains a patent for disease1, then lab1 does not publish findings on disease1.
Rule10: If it is not the case that the failure of lab1 researching disease1 to imply substance1 treating disease1 leads to lab1 halting research on disease1, then lab1 loses funding for disease1.
facts: Fact1: Lab1 submits a manuscript on disease1.
Fact2: Lab1 has equipment for substance1.
Fact3: Lab1 does not halt research on disease1.
Fact4: Lab1 does not lose funding for disease1.
